videos.headline: Akron QB shows off footwork, big arm on TD
videos.description: Akron quarterback Kato Nelson slithers through pressure and zips a bullet to Nate Stewart, who fights and extends to the end zone for a 17-yard catch and score.

videos.headline: Akron takes fumble 46 yards to the house
videos.description: Akron forces a fumble on MU punt returner Joshua Allen as Mykel Traylor Bennett snags the ball and chugs it 46 yards into the end zone for a touchdown.
